recipe.name: Rustic Vegetable Stew with Steamed Rice
recipe.img: 3 Vegetable and chickpea stew with rice.jpg
recipe.ingredients: 1 onion (170 grams), peeled and quartered 100 grams celery, cut in 2-inch chunks 1 clove garlic 1 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons olive oil 200 grams zucchini, cut in 1-inch chunks 1 tablespoon oregano 1 teaspoon basil Pinch crushed red pepper flakes 15 ounce can garbanzo beans, drained 14.5 ounce can petite diced tomatoes 75 grams green olives with pimento 170 grams quick-cooking rice like Minute Rice (white or multi-grain) 2454 grams warm water (or per recipe instructions)

step.describe: Put the onion, celery, garlic, salt, and olive oil in the bowl.
Add the zucchini, oregano, basil, and red pepper flakes

Add the garbanzo beans, diced tomatoes, and olives.
Meanwhile, put the rice and water in a heatproof bowl that will fit in the steamer basket with the lid on. Put the steamer basket on top of the kitchen machine to replace the lid. Put the bowl of rice into the steamer. Put the lid on the steamer.
Drain any excess water from the rice before serving. Serve the vegetable stew on top of the rice. Top with grated cheese or chopped fresh herbs, if desired.
